com.geodrop.DropPay

Class Mno

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geodrop.DropPay.Mno

  • public class Mno
extends java.lang.Object
    Indicates settings for which the payment port is enabled (see Mobile Network Code)
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    A-Tono s.r.l.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String brand
      Short identifier label for network operator
      private java.lang.String mcnc
      Double value parameter made of two dot separated integers
      private java.lang.String operator
      Long network operator description
      private int shortcode
      It is enabled for short messaging features; it is used as sender of short messages pertinent to the payment port, and/or recipient for requests coming from customers (reply messages or purchasing actions)
